channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: When I left Peru for university back in 2022, I gradually abandoned my Mandarin study habits. Even though I had Mandarin classes at school, I couldn’t keep myself motivated to keep up with the grueling grind that is studying a foreign language. Looking back, my tracking system wasn’t strong enough and I didn’t have many sources of motivation. I’ve always wanted to have a blog where I could keep a backlog of my progress, so here it is! I really hope this can keep me on track this time.
